effect.minecraft.jump_boost.description: Increases jump height and reduces fall damage, higher levels increase such effects
effect.minecraft.speed.description: Increases walking speed; higher levels make the player faster and increase their field of view
effect.minecraft.slowness.description: Decreases walking speed; higher levels make the player slower and decrease their field of view
effect.minecraft.mining_fatigue.descript: Decreases mining and attack speed, higher levels decrease the player's mining and attack speed
effect.minecraft.haste.description: Increases mining and attack speed, higher levels increase the player's mining and attack speed
effect.minecraft.strength.description: Increases melee damage, higher levels make the player do more melee damage
effect.minecraft.instant_health.descript: Heals living entities, damages undead, higher levels heal more health
effect.minecraft.instant_damage.descript: Damages living entities, heals undead, higher levels do more damage
effect.minecraft.regeneration.descriptio: Regenerates health over time, higher levels make health regenerate quicker
effect.minecraft.fire_resistance.descrip: Prevents the player from taking damage due to Fire and lava.
effect.minecraft.resistance.description: Reduces damage taken. Higher levels increase mitigation further
effect.minecraft.water_breathing.descrip: Prevents drowning and lets the player breathe underwater
effect.minecraft.invisibility.descriptio: Grants invisibility, making the player invisible (but not the item they hold or the armor they wear)
effect.minecraft.blindness.description: Impairs vision and disables the ability to sprint and critical hit
effect.minecraft.night_vision.descriptio: Allows to see in the dark
effect.minecraft.hunger.description: Increases food exhaustion, higher levels cause the player to starve quicker
effect.minecraft.weakness.description: Decreases melee damage, higher levels decrease more melee damage
effect.minecraft.poison.description: Inflicts non lethal damage over time, higher levels do more damage per second
effect.minecraft.wither.description: Inflicts lethal damage over time, higher levels do more damage per second
effect.minecraft.health_boost.descriptio: Increases maximum health, higher levels give the player more health
effect.minecraft.absorption.description: Adds damage absorption, higher levels give more absorption
effect.minecraft.glowing.description: Marks entities with an outline glow, allowing them to be seen through blocks
effect.minecraft.luck.description: Can increase chances of high-quality and more loot, higher levels increase the chances of better loot
effect.minecraft.unluck.description: Can reduce chances of high-quality and more loot, higher levels reduce the chance of good loot
effect.minecraft.slow_falling.descriptio: Decreases falling speed and negates fall damage
effect.minecraft.conduit_power.descripti: Increases underwater visibility and mining speed, prevents drowning
effect.minecraft.bad_omen.description: Causes an illager raid to start upon entering a village
effect.minecraft.hero_of_the_village.des: Gives discounts on trades with villagers, and makes villagers throw items at the player depending on their profession
